QuestData.Title: The Gods Have Spoken
QuestData.Description: The gods have spoken and we must heed their wisdom.$B$BTravel north to Zim'Rhuk to destroy guardians there until they yield the unblemished heart. Travel east to the Altar of Quetz'lun and disrupt the altar wardens until you recover their gusty essence.$B$BDeliver both to Har'koa and she will combine them into that which will compel late Akali's prophet to appear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Unblemished Heart of the Guardian and the Gusty Essence of the Warden to Har'koa at Zim'Torga.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have that which is required, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Your bravery seems boundless, $n.$B$BPlease hand me the heart and the essence, and I will fashion them into that which will compel the prophet to appear before you.
